parameters.name: AlertOnPartialComplete
parameters.description: Specifies whether to generate alert for partially completed jobs. This parameter is valid only for on-premises file backup and ECS file backup.

parameters.name: ClientId
parameters.description: The ID of the HBR client.

parameters.name: DataNetworkType
parameters.description:
The type of the endpoint on the data plane. Valid values:

*   **PUBLIC**: Internet
*   **VPC**: virtual private cloud (VPC)
*   **CLASSIC**: classic network

parameters.name: DataProxySetting
parameters.description:
The proxy configuration on the data plane. Valid values:

*   **DISABLE**: The proxy is not used.
*   **USE_CONTROL_PROXY** (default): The configuration is the same as that on the control plane.
*   **CUSTOM**: The configuration is customized (HTTP).

parameters.name: MaxCpuCore
parameters.description: The number of CPU cores used by a single backup job. The value 0 indicates that the number is unlimited.

parameters.name: MaxMemory
parameters.description: The maximum memory that can be used by the client. Unit: bytes. Only V2.13.0 and later are supported.

parameters.name: MaxWorker
parameters.description: The number of concurrent backup jobs. The value 0 indicates that the number is unlimited.

parameters.name: ProxyHost
parameters.description: The custom host IP address of the proxy server on the data plane.

parameters.name: ProxyPassword
parameters.description: The custom password of the proxy server on the data plane.

parameters.name: ProxyPort
parameters.description: The custom host port of the proxy server on the data plane.

parameters.name: ProxyUser
parameters.description: The custom username of the proxy server on the data plane.

parameters.name: ResourceGroupId
parameters.description: The ID of the resource group.

parameters.name: UseHttps
parameters.description:
Specifies whether to transmit the data on the data plane over HTTPS. Valid values:

*   true: Data is transmitted over HTTPS.
*   false: Data is transmitted over HTTP.

parameters.name: VaultId
parameters.description: The ID of the backup vault. This parameter is required for the old HBR client.
